extendedInfo.description: Locked up and the only way to get out is to play poker and unlock achievements. This game has pretty high stakes, your life! You either beat these guys at poker and win the equipment you need to escape, or the next 50 years are gonna get real ugly, real fast.Pick your poker poison, Texas Hold'em, Five Card Draw or Seven Card Stud and you better be sure cause this ain't Vegas baby!

reviews.title: Would be nice
reviews.comment: Would be nice to win a hand or 2. Decent game but would be cool to occasionally win. Btw you don\'t win much.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great way to practice Texas Holdem
reviews.comment: There was a 5 thru 9 straight on the board which should mean a spliy pot with all players as long as no one had a 10. Instead the computer gave the pot to a player that had a 7. A bug that needs fixed.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good but need some fixes
reviews.comment: 1. Crash so often especially when a game goes important!!!  2. 5 and 6 look so similar each other. PLEASE make card and font bigger!!! PLEASE..... 3. I made straight with 8, the other got straight with 5. But system called the other\'s win. So buggy...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Cuts out
reviews.comment: If your playing music, forget about it, it will stop playing your music while playing. Cuts out any time it wants to and puts a loading screen on your main home page. Last but not least. If your winning, don\'t check a text or anything cause once you exit that screen, the game will restart. Very annoying.  Kev... EVO 4glte
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: crashes
reviews.comment: fun till it crashes its crap i was bout to win and boom it crashed
reviews.author: Carson Frank

reviews.title: Good game if I could play
reviews.comment: Shame dev gave up on this. The game could be a lot of fun if you could get through a \"full\" round. Game crashes everytime I play for a few minutes on my EVO 4g LTE. Also its seems almost impossible to bluff in this game. Game needs a munch needed update that has yet to be seen
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Crash crash crash
reviews.comment: I have seen my wallpaper more than game play & Convenient it often crashes out on my best hands...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Decent game
reviews.comment: It was pretty fun at first but then it became really time consuming and boring as you had to win with a certain hand at a certain place, which lowered the chance of unlpcking achievement even lower. And it was amazingly ridiculous how easy it was to beat the game in the last stage; i kept going all in and i eliminated all opponents in 7 rounds. WTF
reviews.author: Albert Kang

reviews.title: Cool
reviews.comment: Interesting concept....wrong call on some of the hands, though.....had it beat in a few hours.....wish the story~line had lasted longer, but over~all, I enjoyed it.....
reviews.author: Debbie Reed

reviews.title: Crashes
reviews.comment: I finish 1 out of 9 games. Crashes too much.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Why you don,t
reviews.comment: Need to have the prison hold\'em 2 on hear but why can,t. Ya win on hear a lot not cool you will never have a chance to get out be stuck for ever lol fix and it will be so much better if not will take of and not by any of the game,s ok?
reviews.author: Johnnie Sheckles

reviews.title: Lame
reviews.comment: The more I won the more the game shut down.  I was 21000 sticks of gum up and the game reset.  Bullshit game don\'t play
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Crash
reviews.comment: Crash............few hands played.....crash........few hands played. ...crash. please fix this bug.
reviews.author: Andrew Mier

reviews.title: Too bad
reviews.comment: Good app but now crashes on ICS every time. Droid Bionic.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Cool
reviews.comment: Very different and fun card game. But after playing for a little bit it kicks you off can you fix it please.
reviews.author: Randy Schoonover

reviews.title: Crashes ALOT
reviews.comment: Keeps crashing, would be a 5 star game if it was fixed
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Game AI
reviews.comment: I won\'t say the game cheats but it gets VERY LUCKY on a very regular basis.
reviews.author: Jake Jacobson

reviews.title: Mac
reviews.comment: Crashes on HTC wildfire, looked a decent game
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Stupid
reviews.comment: Every time I get good and ahead it shuts down and resets to my default wallpaper... wtf?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Bulleider82
reviews.comment: Love it
reviews.author: A Google User
